attributes.action: Stand up for all the citizens, council tax payers and proud Mancunians who all contributed to paying for the City of Manchester Stadium prior to the 2002 Commonwealth Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that everyone who does not wish to see a stadium which was intended for the people of Manchester and paid for by the people of Manchester be allowed to be sold by Manchester council to a foreign investment group sign this petition and keep this stadium for all Mancunians. It is already not being used in the promised way. The people of Manchester were told after the Commonwealth Games that the Stadium would be rented by Manchester City Football Club and that other events for the whole of Manchester would be staged at the ground.

This never happens and we feel let down by Manchester Council that their promises have not been fulfilled.

In light of the recent takeover of Manchester City Football Club, the council can not be allowed to sell off the stadium and the surrounding land to a foreign investment group.
